title: Карл Маркс. Молодые годы
overview: The young editor of the Rhine newspaper, Karl Marx, seeks to know the true facts, to attract readers to the most acute and painful questions of reality. Carl still lives in Cologne alone, and Eugene in Trier. The articles of the Rhine newspaper provoke the anger of the royal court, more severe censorship restrictions are imposed and only the courage and diplomatic art of the editor of the newspaper Marx save her from closing, Zhenya's half brother as the eldest in the family demands Marx to break off all relations with Zhenya, refused to marry ...
